en_text: What do you mean, "just" me?

en_text: It seems the results of that \Ncalligraphy exhibition are out.

I'm going to fall

２位の悔しさば
なめちゃいけん！

I regret the second place
Lick!

en_text: Hey, everyone! Sensei's comin'!

（美和）あれ 私んクラッカーは？

（なる）あっ あああ…

en_text: I'm home...

en_text: Sensei, you all right?

en_text: You guys are treating me like this \Nafter I was gone all this time?

en_text: Looks like he's in a good mood.

(It will be a teacher
How did you do the calligraphy tournament?

（２人）なっ！

en_text: It's a very delicate subject!

en_text: Did ya?

お前ら もしかして
書展の結果 気にしてんのか？

You guys
Are you bothered by the book exhibition?

（なる）うわー やったー！

en_text: The old veterans were just too good this time.

されたくなかったんだろ

Young people
I did not want to

google_translated:
This should be original

en_text: Oh, Sensei!
jp_text: （川藤）ああ 先生

jp_text: 清舟に 結果は知らせたんだね？

For those guy
Do you think that it was disappointing result?

もったいつけんで教えてよ
よか結果やろ？

en_text: it's about what's most important to me right now.

Shallow you are

おっはカブトムシっち思った

（ユタカ）おっはカマキリ

jp_text: （タマ）あきは また いい子ぶって

jp_text: （美和）冷めちょっとよ あきは

en_text: Sheesh...
jp_text:
（子供たちの笑い声）

jp_text:
何も考えずに楽しんでる
お前らを見ると
google_translated:
Enjoy without thinking anything
When you look at you

en_text: it has an influence on me, too.
